title: How to Access Gmail: Getting Started & Adding Multiple Accounts

steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. Go to https://www.gmail.com/ in your web browser. This will open the Gmail login page. [1] X Research source If you want to open Gmail on a computer, you can do so from any web browser (e.g., Firefox, Safari, Chrome, etc.). If you want to use Google-specific features of Gmail, such as offline mail, you'll need to open Gmail in Google Chrome . If you haven’t yet, you’ll need to create a Gmail account . You can also check out our guide on how to send an email in Gmail .

steps.title: Enter your email address.
steps.content: Enter your email address. Type your Gmail email address into the "Email or phone" text box in the middle of the page. [2] X Research source If you don’t remember your email, click Forgot email? below the email entry box. [3] X Research source If you don’t know your password, click Forgot password? to reset your Gmail password .

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next . It's the blue button below the "Email or phone" text box. This will take you to the password entry page.

steps.title: Enter your password.
steps.content: Enter your password. Type in the password used to access your Gmail account. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next . It's below the password entry box. This will open your Gmail inbox.

steps.title: Tap Search in the App Store.
steps.content: Tap Search in the App Store . It's a tab at the bottom of the screen. Doing so brings up the Search page. If you already have the Gmail app installed, skip to the Gmail sign-in step below.

steps.title: Search for Gmail.
steps.content: Search for Gmail. Tap the search bar at the top of the screen, then type in gmail . Tap search on the keyboard to see the results. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap GET.
steps.content: Tap GET . It's to the right of the "Gmail - Email by Google" heading. The Gmail app icon is a multicolor “M” on a white background.

steps.title: Sign in to Apple ID.
steps.content: Sign in to Apple ID. If you’re prompted to sign in , enter your Apple ID password to confirm the Gmail app download. [6] X Research source If you have Touch ID set up, you can use your fingerprint to sign in instead.

steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. Tap OPEN in the App Store, or tap the Gmail app icon on your iPhone's Home screen.

steps.title: Tap SIGN IN.
steps.content: Tap SIGN IN . It's at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Sign in to Gmail.
steps.content: Sign in to Gmail. If there's no Google Account signed in on your iPhone, select the Google option when prompted. Then do the following: Enter your Gmail email address. Tap Next . Enter your Gmail password. You can reset or recover it if needed . Tap Next . If you see your Google Account listed on Gmail, you can skip the login process by tapping the switch button to the right of your account's name.

steps.title: Wait for your inbox to load.
steps.content: Wait for your inbox to load. Once you're done signing into Gmail, your inbox should load within a few seconds.

steps.title: Download Gmail.
steps.content: Download Gmail. Get the official Gmail app from the Google Play Store (or your preferred Android app store). [7] X Research source If Gmail is already installed, skip to the Gmail sign-in step below. You can check by opening the App Drawer by tapping on the Home screen (or by swiping up on some Androids). Most Androids come with Gmail installed.

steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. Tap the Gmail app icon on your home screen or in the App Drawer. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Sign in.
steps.content: Tap Sign in . It's at the bottom of the screen. If you aren't currently logged into your preferred Google Account on your Android, you can instead tap Add another email address , tap Google , and enter your email address and password when prompted.

steps.title: Enter your Email.
steps.content: Enter your Email. Type in your Gmail email address when prompted. Then. tap Next . [9] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your password.
steps.content: Enter your password. If asked for your Gmail password to log in, type it into the provided text field and tap Next . Since you use your Google Account to log into your Android itself, you usually won't need to enter your password.

steps.title: Wait for your inbox to load.
steps.content: Wait for your inbox to load. Once you've finished selecting your account and logging in, your Gmail inbox should load within a few seconds. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. Go to https://www.gmail.com/ in your web browser. This will open your Gmail inbox if you're logged in. [11] X Research source If you aren't logged in, enter your email address and password when prompted.

steps.title: Click the profile button.
steps.content: Click the profile button. It's the circle icon in the top right corner of the page. Clicking it opens a drop-down menu. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Click Add another account.
steps.content: Click Add another account . Doing so opens a new sign-in page. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the Gmail email address.
steps.content: Enter the Gmail email address. Type in the email address of the Gmail account you want to add.

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next . It's the blue button below the "Email or phone" text box.

steps.title: Enter your password.
steps.content: Enter your password. Type in the password you use to log into your Gmail account.

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next . It's below the Password text box. Doing so will both add the account to your list of currently signed-in accounts, and open the account's inbox.

steps.title: Switch between accounts.
steps.content: Switch between accounts. If you want to switch between signed-in accounts, click the profile button, then click the account you want to view.

steps.title: Tap the profile button.
steps.content: Tap the profile button. It’s the circle icon in the top right of the Gmail app.

steps.title: Tap Add another account.
steps.content: Tap Add another account . It’s next to the person icon with a plus sign. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Google.
steps.content: Tap Google . It's at the top of the list of options. [15] X Research source You may be prompted to allow Google to sign you in. If so, tap Continue or Allow .

steps.title: Enter your email address.
steps.content: Enter your email address. Tap the "Email or phone" text box, then type in the email address for the account you want to use. [16] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . It's below the email entry box.

steps.title: Enter your password.
steps.content: Enter your password. Type in the password you use to log into your Gmail account.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . It's at the bottom of the page. Doing so will both add the account to your list of currently signed-in accounts, and open the account's inbox.

steps.title: Switch between accounts.
steps.content: Switch between accounts. If you want to switch to a different signed-in account, tap the profile button. Then, tap an account in the profile menu.
